channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No one cares if you roll in on time anymore, but here are the behaviors co-workers do mind
item.description: Depending on sector, emphasis on punctuality has waned as remote work has thrived.

item.title: Single Parents Should Get as Much Paid Leave as Couples, Spanish Court Rules
item.description: The decision follows a constitutional court ruling that barred discrimination against babies born into single-parent families.

item.title: Medtronic taps Renault’s CFO to be its new finance chief. How his unusual career path helped land the job
item.description: Thierry Piéton will end his CFO tenure at French automaker Renault Group on Feb. 28.

item.title: Spate of Violent Antisemitic Attacks Rattles Australia
item.description: The police said they were investigating whether “overseas actors” were involved the vandalizing of synagogues and a day care center.
